content: SAN FRANCISCO  May 1 German business software company SAP said on Friday it is not considering acquiring online rival Salesforce.com Inc  after a news report suggested the leaders of the two companies had held talks about strategic alliances last year.

content: PARIS  March 30 European stocks were set to rise on Monday  bouncing back from last week's losses with tech shares in focus after news of merger talks in the sector spurred a late-session rally on Wall Street on Friday.
